resources.string: This app is intended to show you the difference between an app that follow the best practices and other that doesn\'t. \n\nThrough the views you will see an info button on the app bar, there you will have some explanations about what is right or wrong on the screen.
As you can see, there is a lot of empty space after the category names, and even more at the bottom of the screen.
What do you want to edit?
The problem here is the lack of navigability to the images on the same case. \nIf you want to go to them, you should go back and then to the images.
This view have direct access to the images on the same category, and to the categories, so you can access quickly to any place of the app.
The problem here is the whitespace to both sizes of the images, especially on landscape mode. \n\nAlso, as on the notes activity, you can\'t go to the notes on the same case.
As you can see, the images are arranged to fit the screen to use more empty space. \n\nAlso as in the notes view, you can access quickly to any place of the app.
Here you can\'t go to the other images on the same category on fullscreen mode, you have to close it and open another
In this case you can access the other images simply by swiping to the left or right.
